title: UnboundLocalError: local variable 'cfg' referenced before assignment in Colab
body:
Your Operating system and DeepLabCut version

Frames extracted and labeled in windows,  anaconda3 env, with DLC 2.0.5, 

Trying to train network using GoogleColab, DLC 2.0.5. browser Chrome Version 72.0.3626.121 (Official Build) (64-bit)

Describe the problem

As per instructions copied the DLC folders created locally on my PC to Drive, no issues with any of the setup on the Colab notebook. Changed the config.yaml and pose_config.yaml folders to reflect the Drive locations, (e.g project_path: '/content/drive/My Drive/DeepLabCut/humm3-cristian-2019-03-10).
path_config_file = '/content/drive/My Drive/DeepLabCut/humm3-cristian-2019-03-10/config.yaml'

when try to create a training data set I get the following error:

UnboundLocalError                         Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-15-aeb364f4d074> in <module>()
----> 1 deeplabcut.create_training_dataset(path_config_file)

/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/deeplabcut/generate_training_dataset/trainingsetmanipulation.py in create_training_dataset(config, num_shuffles, Shuffles, windows2linux)
    430 
    431     # Loading metadata from config file:
--> 432     cfg = auxiliaryfunctions.read_config(config)
    433     scorer = cfg['scorer']
    434     project_path = cfg['project_path']

/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/deeplabcut/utils/auxiliaryfunctions.py in read_config(configname)
     82     else:
     83         raise FileNotFoundError ("Config file is not found. Please make sure that the file exists and/or there are no unnecessary spaces in the path of the config file!")
---> 84     return(cfg)
     85 
     86 def write_config(configname,cfg):

UnboundLocalError: local variable 'cfg' referenced before assignment

Thank you
